page.title: 18TIBSHELF RABBIT CLUB
page.content:
We have a rabbit club in Tibshelf. My mam and dad help run a rabbit show on the third Sunday of each month. When it is a rabbit show we have to put the pens up and some tables and chairs. There are two big tables and we have to put white cloths on them. We put some long boards on trestles and then metal pens on top. My sister Julie and I put sawdust in the pens and fix the numbers.
The show starts at 7.00 p.m. and there is a raffle as well as judging the rabbits. There are usually about 40 entries. The winners get certificates, rosettes or cups. I help put the certificates on the pens and after the show I help to put the tables away again. by Steven (11)
